about_the_game:
The Fantasy Card Game is available in version 2.0 with 3 New Game Modes, more advanced enemies, cards and more. The Magic Battles for the supremacy in the territory, 2 players in Local Multi, Tower of Mytikas and Conquest in Ziliana Gorge. Zeus awaits in the Top, the glory awaits for you. Play now.

Versus.

Direct confront with enemies and Chance Encounters for win Mastery.

Multiplayer, Tower and Conquest Modes is not available in Demo Version.

Discover one easy game with new content and magic cards.
